meanings.sent1: The aurous jewelry sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had an aurous sheen that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The aurous cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The aurous sunset painted the sky in shades of gold.
meanings.sent5: The aurous coins gleamed in the treasure chest.

meanings.definition: Resembling gold in color or luster
meanings.sent1: The autumn leaves had an aurous hue.
meanings.sent2: The painting had an aurous glow that made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: Her hair shone with an aurous radiance under the lights.
meanings.sent4: The aurous sand on the beach sparkled like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The aurous crown on his head made him look like a king.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the chemical element gold
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted experiments with aurous compounds.
meanings.sent2: The aurous metal was highly sought after for its properties.
meanings.sent3: The aurous solution turned a vibrant color when mixed.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held an aurous glint of intelligence.
meanings.sent5: The aurous necklace was a symbol of wealth and power.
